course_title: Directed Research: Bauer Memory at Emory Lab
class_notes: For students conducting research outside of the Department of Psychology, the contract must be approved by Dr. Andrew Kazama (akazama@emory.edu) as the department's director of undergraduate research before submitting it to Ms. Houser.
course_description: Credit variable. Psychology majors only, registration by permission of faculty supervisor.
